items.question: How does Stack Wallet make money?
items.answer: Stack Wallet charges a tiny fee for utilizing the built-in exchange with third-party providers. Standard sending and receiving fees go to blockchain miners. Stack Wallet does not make money by selling user data or using ads.

items.question: How does the exchange process work?
items.answer: Stack Wallet partners with third-party exchange providers for seamless exchanges. Simply follow the exchange flow within the app, and the third-party exchange will handle the rest, making it easy for you.
